plugin.name: DenonAvpControl
plugin.title: Denon AVP/AVR Control
plugin.desc: This plugin will control a network ready Denon or Marantz AVP/AVR from a Logitech Media Server client or Squeezebox. The plugin will turn the AVR on/off, adjust and synchronize the volume, and set various audio modes in each player.
plugin.creator: Chris Couper
